title: [Temple of Industry, Courtyard]
description: Lazing beneath the shadow of the a smoky steel-trimmed temple, a dry landscape of boulders borders the ovular granite courtyard.  The granite stones, laden with ruddy iron veins, form a small trail that slopes down to the west.  Sunlight gleams off of the temple's metal surfaces, lending grace to the hard-edged edifice.

Slumbering below the dark silhouette of a smoky steel-trimmed temple, a dry landscape of boulders borders the ovular granite courtyard.  The granite stones, laden with ruddy iron veins, form a small trail that slopes down to the west.  Moonlight pools in the crevices of the temple's metallic construction, softening the edifice's hard edges.
